extendedInfo.description: Multimedia and multilingual application (Spanish, Basque, French and English) to get the latest world, life, politics, sports and culture news in the Basque Country from the Basque media group EITB.  The application allows you to follow the special events streamed live on eitb.com as well as the broadcasts of the most outstanding sport, cultural, social and entertainment events in the Basque Country. You can also listen to EITB's five radio stations: Radio Euskadi, Euskadi Irratia, Radio Vitoria, EiTB Irratia and Gaztea.  You can also have access to EITB-on-demand, where you can watch videos and listen to audios on demand from the best TV and radio programs and share them on the social networks Facebook and Twitter. You can find videos and sketches from our best TV shows, including Vaya Semanita, El Conquistador del fin del mundo, Robin Food, Finlandia, Kresala, La Noche de..., News, Euskadi Directo, Kerman, and much much more.. which can all be shared via social networks such as Facebook and Twitter.The EiTB group is the Basque Country's leading news and entertainment provider, with almost thirty years of experience. It is the public radio and television of the Basque Country, fully committed to offering coverage of all items of Basque news and cultural which are of interest to the community.The application allows you to follow the special events streamed live on eitb.com as well as the broadcasts of the most outstanding sport, cultural, social and entertainment events in the Basque Country. You can also have access to EITB-on-demand, where you can watch videos and listen to audios on demand from the best TV and radio programs and share them on the social networks Facebook and Twitter.TV-broadcasting will only be available for devices with android 4.0 operative system or superior

reviews.title: Nexus 7 Android 4.2.2 --> arazoa konpondurik
reviews.comment: Lortu dut arazoa konpontzea. Nexus 7-ak berez ez dauka Flash. Berau instalatuz konpontzen da arazoa. *****  Aplikazioa instalatzea lortu dut baina ez dabil. Zabaltzean pantaila urdina eitb-ren logoarekin agertzen da, besterik ez.
reviews.author: Asier ZM

reviews.title: Gaztea ez da entzuten
reviews.comment: Badira hiru egun Gaztea ez dela entzuten Androideko aplikazioaren bitartez. Euskadi irratia eta Radio Euskadik ondo funtzionatzen dute, baino Gaztea ez! Kanpoan bizi naiz eta Jon Gotzon behar dut goizetan ;) Mesedez konpondu arazoa.
reviews.author: Inaki Arruti

reviews.title: samsung tablet
reviews.comment: No me deja instalar el app de eitb en mi tablet, porque ? Muchas gracias.
reviews.author: Laurel Shiells

reviews.comment: Bada aste bat eguneratu nuela ta lehenbiziko aldian ongi zebilen. Bigarren edo hirugarrenez martxan jarri eta ez dabil. Lehen pantallan gelditzen da, konexiorik izango ez balu bezala, konektaturik egon arren.
reviews.author: aritza iriarte garmendia

reviews.title: Zuzenekorik ez
reviews.comment: Zuzenekoa ez dabil HTC mugikorrean, ez irratia ezta telebista ere
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I really love this app & found it by chance. It\'s simple & easy yet clean & sophisticated. Thank you!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great for written news, but it won\'t stream live radio properly in my HTC. That would be perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Genial!!
reviews.comment: Este app es una maravilla. Gracias!!
reviews.author: A Google User
